title: [SEVERE BUG] LeBlanc Chroma displaying wrong colors
body:
http://imgur.com/E7oVnJT

Hard LB nerf even nerfed her chroma!

These two are not the same chroma? I paid for a grey Chroma with purple accents and when I got into game I have a grey chroma with red accents?

False Advertising, please fix - or add this one as an alternative option because it's still pretty cute I just like the other one better.

replies.body:
Hi! 

Thanks for the report! We're in the process of figuring out what happened here and are working to align the assets. :)

**EDIT:** The store asset is correct, and we're working to pop the correct texture back into the build. This is something you'll see for patch 7.7. Sorry for the bug. We figured out what happened (a file was overwritten), and we've taken steps to prevent this from occurring the future. ;_; Thanks for your patience! <3
